net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy

Class MultiLabelMaxLossQueryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy.AbstractQueryStrategy
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy.AbstractMultiLabelQueryStrategy
        • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy.MultiLabelMaxLossQueryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IConfigure, IQueryStrategy, JCLAL

    public class MultiLabelMaxLossQueryStrategy
extends AbstractMultiLabelQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Max Loss active strategy. See for more information Li, X., Wcing, L., and Sung, E. (2004). Multi-label svm active learning for image classification, 2207-2210.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • utilityInstance

        public double utilityInstance(weka.core.Instance instance)
        Test the instance according to the query strategy. Return the utility of the instance according to the query strategy
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance to compute the utility.
        Returns:
        the value calculated for the query strategy for the instance
